name: Tamagotchi RPG
description:
I literally just recompiled the Klik n Play I made with my sister back in high school because it opened in Clickteam Fusion and I was like "okay, whatever, fine, Build".  I've barely tested it, but let me know if there are any bugs.
I also have the *original* original for Win 3.X/95 archived and available for streaming on archive.org: https://archive.org/details/tamrpg_1998

Here's the (mostly) original copy from the page I made for it back in 1998:

Great News from the Totally Obsessed Creators of BAUT!
Tamagotchi RPG, a project worked on in secret for a while, is now released and ready for all you Tamaniacs to download!!!!

In short, here is the story:

This story takes place shortly before the first Tama-eggs were sent to earth.
Evil Aliens have invaded the once-peaceful Tamagotchi planet, and Ginger the Ginjirotchi decides to take action, and save the planet! If the aliens are not gotten rid of, it will be unsafe to send the Tamagotchis off the Planet!!!! The fate of the Tam universe rests in your hands!

Features:

  • You can talk to all your Tama-friends and learn about what you must do to defeat the evil aliens.
  • Help the people (and animals too) that you meet, and they may help you back.
  • As in all RPGs, you should SAVE OFTEN!!!!! (It has a rudimentary password system since Klik n Play, the earlier incarnation of Clickteam Fusion, did not have any way to save files).
  • Watch out for the Evil aliens! Make sure you have the best defense and weapon you can before getting near them!!!
